row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.JOB.CHECK_REQUEST_STATUS@GENERIC
row.description: Check status of an Azure request

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Keystore Location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Keystore Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Azure Request ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "CHECK_REQUEST_STATUS"
! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 8
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-subscriptionid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-keystore" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-requestid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
! password is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Build java arguments :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGS_MANAGEMENT
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CHECK REQUEST STATUS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CHECK REQUEST STATUS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: ! Publishing Request Status :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_STATUS" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_STATUS# =STR_TRIM(&VALUE#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_STATUS#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_STATUS# = "" :ENDIF
